abstract_summ: A stochastic susceptible–infectious–recovered epidemic model with nonlinear incidence rate is formulated to discuss the effects of temporary immunity, vaccination, and Le.´vy jumps on the transmission of diseases.A stochastic susceptible–infectious–recovered epidemic model with temporary immunity and media coverage is proposed.This results in a system of forward backward stochastic differential equations, which is amenable to numerical solution via Monte Carlo simulations.A unique global positive solution for the epidemic model is obtained.We study global dynamics of an SIR model with vaccination, where we assume that individuals respond differently to dynamics of the epidemic.
title_summ: Dynamics analysis of a delayed virus model with two different transmission methods and treatmentsA stochastic analysis for a triple delayed SIQR epidemic model with vaccination and elimination strategiesDynamics of epidemic models from cavity master equationsDynamics of SIR model with vaccination and heterogeneous behavioral response of individuals modeled by the Preisach operatorEpidemic control via stochastic optimal controlA stochastic SIR epidemic model with Lévy jump and media coverageA delayed vaccinated epidemic model with nonlinear incidence rate and Lévy jumps
title_abstract_phrases: A delayed vaccinated epidemic model with nonlinear incidence rate and Lévy jumpsA stochastic susceptible–infectious–recovered epidemic model with nonlinear incidence rate is formulated to discuss the effects of temporary immunity, vaccination, and Le.´vy jumps on the transmission of diseases.A stochastic analysis for a triple delayed SIQR epidemic model with vaccination and elimination strategiesIn this paper, a delayed SIQR epidemic model with vaccination and elimination hybrid strategies is analysed under a white noise perturbation.Dynamics of epidemic models from cavity master equationsWe apply the cavity master equation (CME) approach to epidemics models.A stochastic SIR epidemic model with Lévy jump and media coverageA stochastic susceptible–infectious–recovered epidemic model with temporary immunity and media coverage is proposed.Dynamics analysis of a delayed virus model with two different transmission methods and treatmentsIn this paper, a delayed virus model with two different transmission methods and treatments is investigated.
